name: GaliKnight: Starstorm
description:
Arrow keys or 'WASD' to move.  Hold 'Space' to shoot.

A space shoot em' up prototype made using assets by Kenney (Kenney's Game Assets).

This game follows along with "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D: Learn to Code Making Games" on Udemy. I have uploaded it here after finishing this part of the course to experiment with Unity's Web features and share with my friends.

*Known issue: Clicking off the game while firing will result in infinite firing.
